mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, S.W. Tiffey to Nancy Halsted, 1869 December 8
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tiffey, S. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from S.W. Tiffey, secretary, to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, December 8, 1869. Expects the oil cloth and cornice soon. Acknowledges the Wilton carpet gift from W.B. Kendall. Makes suggestions for minor furnishings. Bureau is 54" x 20", pillows 18" x 22". Expects Mrs. Mitchell and her friends for a visit. The reporter's article in Evening Star is inaccurate. Suggests publishing a gift list in the Washington paper.
